alert.note: Alert for Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 5:01AM EDT until June 26 at 6:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 401 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Laurel Hill to 12 miles south of Baker to 14 miles southeast of Pensacola Beach, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Villa Tasso, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge, Knox Hill, New Harmony, Piney Grove and Four Mile Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
